text: Looking to go to an outsourced model for our HubSpot Platinum Partner level agency. Want to discuss retainer model options that allow for small fix quick turns (24-48 hours) and larger site build projects with dedicated hours available. Anyone available for a chat about it?
Hello John, does that include email development and integration in Design Manager using Hubl?

Hi There :wave:  Excited to be here!  My name is Sreenivas. I am using and learning HubSpot and leading customer success for my team at Axelerant. I am so so so very excited to be part of this HS community and looking for all that we can exchange. Feel free to reach out to me. <https://www.linkedin.com/in/kasiviswanathans/>
I am currently hiring a customer success manager  (<https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2599880611/>)  and also a RevOps (CS Ops) - a specialist to help with HubSpot as well (<https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2599881610>)
We are looking for a website developer with HubSpot experience. Check out the position if you are interested. Must be in the US and preferably in Wisconsin. <https://wdrt.co/3zrV3pA>
HI <@U01ASA62NQG> please check my profile I will help you on this
